description: A superhero moonlighting as a stadium security guard unleashed his powers on an unsuspecting mortal who dared run onto his turf. | Sports
title: Chiefs Security Guard Mauls Fan Who Runs Onto Field
title_page: Chiefs Security Guard Mauls Fan Who Runs Onto Field | Breitbart
text:
A 346-pound man masquerading as Tim Tebow tried to steal the spotlight on Sunday night, after the Chiefs Dontari Poe brilliantly executed the “Bloated Tebow” jump pass on his way to becoming the heaviest man in NFL history to ever throw a touchdown pass.
Yet, the real show stealer occurred via a superhero moonlighting as a stadium security guard who unleashed his powers on an unsuspecting mortal who dared run onto his turf.
The Chiefs might want to clear some space on their practice squad for this guy:
Just the latest Bronco to get tackled tonight. #ChiefsKingdom pic.twitter.com/JA98It7WUD — Jordan Airington (@AirJ96) December 26, 2016
Follow Dylan Gwinn on Twitter: @themightygwinn
